verses.name: Mark 11:24
verses.text: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.

verses.name: Mark 11:25
verses.text: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.

verses.name: Mark 11:26
verses.text: But if ye do not forgive, neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses.

verses.name: Mark 11:27
verses.text: And they come again to Jerusalem: and as he was walking in the temple, there come to him the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders,
